title: Why Switch to Reusable Straws? - 5 Reasons You Simply Can't Ignore
body: 1) Disposable plastic straws are TOXIC. Plastic drinking straws can contain harmful toxins that can be detrimental to your health and the health of your loved ones, including Phthalates and Bisphenol A. More commonly known as BPA, Bisphenol A has been linked to brain and behaviour problems, increased risk of cancer, heart problems and increased ...
